channel.title: R Markdown on Jolande Poel
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Jolande Poel

item.title: My first post
item.description: Hi! My name is Jolande and I just succesfully made this site. Finally. After having a run-in with git submodules. Again. I wanted to try out some R code to see if this all works correctly: data("iris") library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 2.2.1 v purrr 0.2.4 ## v tibble 1.4.2 v dplyr 0.7.4 ## v tidyr 0.8.0 v stringr 1.2.0 ## v readr 1.
